title: Man on left wearing eyeglasses, dark pinstriped suit, light colored button down collared shirt, and dark patterned necktie, holding dark hat and coat, woman on right wearing  dark coat with collar, lapels, and large light colored buttons, dark blouse with light colored collar, and dark shoes, holding package and umbrella, exiting dark studded swinging door with circular window, sign above door inscribed "Court Room 3", in interior with large sized tile floor, wood wainscot and pilasters, ashtray canister, and dark door with window on right marked 806
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
